sentence: Monday on FNC’s “The Ingraham Angle,” Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) condemned the Biden administration’s use of government power to infringe on the exercise of First and Second Amendment rights.
author: Jeff Poor
title: Jordan: ‘Scary Stuff’ What the Biden Administration Has Done with First Amendment Rights, Second Amendment Liberties

author: Will
title: Watch: Abbott’s Buses of Illegals Arrive in DC

sentence: The memo for Republicans, prepared by Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio, the ranking member on the committee, details how the right plans to use the hearing to portray Democrats as pushing “far-left policies” that seek to abolish all immigration enforcement and even “encourage” illegal immigration.
title: G.O.P. Memo Shows Road Map for Attacking Democrats on Immigration
